participant_1.background:
I'm a happy homebody despite my career and my love for milk.
I don't own a car because I like to walk or ride my bike.
my favorite band is metallica.
I often find myself watching SpongeBob while I should be working.
I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears.

participant_2.background:
I like going to Halloween parties because I can dress up and be someone else.
i never learned how to drive.
I listen to jazz and reminisce about my time in Paris.
Baking is my passion, and I have a soft spot for dogs.
I finally got up the courage to try a new exercise class and really enjoyed it!

content.text: It's going really well! I got up the courage to try a new exercise class and I really enjoyed it!
That's great! I'm so glad you had a good time. I'm just getting ready to start a new work project, and I'm a little nervous.
I know how that feels. What kind of project is it?
It's a marketing campaign for a new product. I've never done anything like this before, so I'm not really sure where to start.
Well, I'm sure you'll do a great job! Just remember to stay focused and don't be afraid to ask for help if you need it.
Thanks! I appreciate the encouragement. I'm sure I'll be fine.
Great! So, what are you doing tonight?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go out with some friends or just stay in and watch a movie.
Either sounds like a good time. I'm going to go bake some cookies. I love baking!
That sounds delicious! I wish I could bake.
You should learn! It's really easy and it's a great way to relax.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! Have a great night!
